conbody.p: The Secretary of Labor has established an Administrative Review Board which decides appeals of final decisions made by the Department of Labor concerning Construction Wage Rate Requirements statute wage determinations. A contracting agency or other interested party may file a petition for review under the procedures in 29 CFR Part7 if reconsideration by the Administrator has been sought pursuant to 29 CFR1.8 and denied.
